roleset.name: think about again

example.name: almost always infinitival
example.text: `` Perhaps if my personal matters can be resolved with Laurel bank in the near future , I may be inclined to reconsider your request ... ''

example.name: with grounds
example.text: Britain and all of Europe need to reconsider the prospects for European integration in light of the possible reunification and neutralization of Germany .

propbank.arg: in light of the possible reunification and neutralization of Germany

roleset.note: RECONSIDER-V NOTES: This is not a remapping from 'consider', because 'reconsider' cannottake a secondary predicate: John is considered an idiot, but not Johnis reconsidered an idiot. (from reconsider.01-v)
